DOMNode *  reply,
XMLCommonEntities::coordinateType  format,
int32  northLat,
int32  westLon,
int32  southLat,
int32  eastLon,
int  indentLevel,
bool  indent
) 
 

Prints a boundingbox node as child to curr.

Parameters:
curr Where to put the boundingbox node as last child.
reply The document to make the nodes in.
format The coordinate format to use.
northLat The northmost latitude.
westLon The westmost longitude.
southLat The southmost latitude.
eastLon The eastmost longitude.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If indent.

int32  lon,
uint16  angle,
XMLCommonEntities::coordinateType  positionSystem,
DOMNode *  cur,
DOMDocument *  reply,
int  indentLevel,
bool  indent
) 
 

Appends a position_item as child to cur.

Parameters:
lat The latitude.
lon The longitude.
angle The angle of the position. If > 360 then not valid and is not added.
positionSystem The positionSystem to use.
cur Where to put the position_item node as last child.
reply The document to make the nodes in.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If indent.

int32  lat = MAX_INT32,
int32  lon = MAX_INT32,
MC2BoundingBox *  bbox = NULL,
XMLCommonEntities::coordinateType  positionSystem = XMLCommonEntities::MC2,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params = SearchRequestParameters()
) 
 

Prints a search_area node as child to list, uses explicit parametrs.

Parameters:
list Where to put the search_area node as last child.
reply The document to make the node in.
type The type of area match.
name The name of the area.
mapID The mapID.
itemID The itemID.
mask The mask.
regions The regions of this area.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If to use indent.
locationName The location name of the area.
showLatLon If to print lat and lon nodes.
lat The latitude of the area center, if any.
lon The longitude of the area center, if any.
bbox The boundingbox for the search_area. Default NULL.
positionSystem The coordinate format to use. Default MC2.
params The search request parameters used to select what search areas to print for the seacrch area.

lon The longitude of the area center, if any.
bbox The boundingbox for the search_area. Default NULL.
positionSystem The coordinate format to use. Default MC2.
params The search request parameters used to select what search areas to print for the seacrch area.

OverviewMatch *  match,

bool  indent,

const SearchRequestParameters &  params = SearchRequestParameters()
) 
 

Prints n search_area nodes as children to list where n is the size of the OverviewMatch.

Parameters:
list Where to put the search_area node as last child.
reply The document to make the nodes in.
match The match to print.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If to use indent.
showLatLon If to print lat and lon nodes.
lat The latitude of the area center, if any.
lon The longitude of the area center, if any.
bbox The boundingbox for the search_areas. Default NULL.
positionSystem The coordinate format to use. Default MC2.
params The search request parameters used to select what search areas to print for the seacrch area.

DOMElement* appendSearchAreaList (  DOMNode *  curr,
DOMDocument *  reply,
int  indentLevel,
bool  indent,
const SearchResultRequest &  req,
const char *  currentLocation,
int32  searchItemStartingIndex,
int32  searchItemEndingIndex,
bool  latlonForSearchHits,
bool  positionSearchItems,
XMLCommonEntities::coordinateType  positionSystem,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
DOMElement *  inlistNode = NULL
) 
 

Appends search_hit_list to curr with search_area nodes.

Parameters:
curr Where to put the search_item_list as last child.
reply The document to make the nodes in.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If to use indent.
searchItemStartingIndex The index in matches to start list at.
searchItemEndingIndex The index in matches to stop list at.
latlonForSearchHits If to add lat and lon from matches as explicit_itemid. OBSOLETE!
positionSearchItems If to add lat and lon as lat and lon nodes to search_items.
positionSystem The coordinate system to use for coordinates.
Returns:
DOMElement to created search item list

DOMElement* appendSearchItem (  DOMNode *  list,
DOMDocument *  reply,
const VanillaMatch *  match,
const char *  currentLocation,
int  indentLevel,
bool  indent,
bool  latlonForSearchHits = false,
int32  lat = 0,
int32  lon = 0,
bool  positionSearchMatch = false,
MC2BoundingBox *  bbox = NULL,
XMLCommonEntities::coordinateType  positionSystem = XMLCommonEntities::MC2,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params = SearchRequestParameters(),
bool  usePersistentIds = false,
XMLParserThread *  thread = NULL,
bool  addImageName = false,
bool  includeInfoItem = false
) 
 

Prints a search_item node as child to list.

Parameters:
list Where to put the search_item node as last child.
reply The document to make the nodes in.
match The match to print.
currentLocation The name of the current location.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If to use indent.
latlonForSearchHits If to add lat and lon from matches as explicit_itemid. OBSOLETE!
lat The latitude for the item.
lon The longitude for the item.
positionSearchMatch If to add lat and lon as lat and lon nodes to the search_item.
bbox Added as a boundingbbox to the item if not NULL and is valid.
positionSystem The coordinate system to use for coordinates.
params The search request parameters used to select what search areas to print for the seacrch area.
usePersistentIds If to not use normal itemid but "persistent" identifiers, not supported by almost all requests.
thread Thread to get Handler to get image names from.
addImageName If to add image attribute using searchHandler.
includeInfoItem If to add an info_item in the node.
Returns:
The created search item element.

DOMElement* appendSearchItemList (  DOMNode *  curr,
DOMDocument *  reply,
int  indentLevel,
bool  indent,
const SearchResultRequest &  req,
const char *  currentLocation,
int32  searchItemStartingIndex,
int32  searchItemEndingIndex,
bool  latlonForSearchHits,
bool  positionSearchItems,
XMLCommonEntities::coordinateType  positionSystem,
const SearchRequestParameters &  params,
DOMElement *  optionalSearchList = NULL,
XMLParserThread *  thread = NULL,
uint32  headingID = MAX_UINT32,
bool  usePersistentIds = false,
bool  includeInfoItem = false
) 
 

Appends a search_item_list to curr.

Parameters:
curr Where to put the search_item_list as last child.
reply The document to make the nodes in.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If to use indent.
searchItemStartingIndex The index in matches to start list at.
searchItemEndingIndex The index in matches to stop list at.
latlonForSearchHits If to add lat and lon from matches as explicit_itemid. OBSOLETE!
positionSearchItems If to add lat and lon as lat and lon nodes to search_items.
positionSystem The coordinate system to use for coordinates.
params The search request parameters used to select what search areas to print for the seacrch area.
optionalSearchList If not NULL this list is used to add search_item into.
thread Thread to get Handler to get image names from.
headingID The heading Id for the list.
usePersistentIds If to not use normal itemid but "persistent" identifiers, not supported by almost all requests.
includeInfoItem If to add an info_item in the nodes.
Returns:
The created search item list, can be optionalSearchList.

void appendSearchListElement (  DOMNode *  parentNode,
DOMDocument *  replyDoc,
const SearchResultRequest *  req,
uint32  maxHits,
XMLCommonEntities::coordinateType  positionSystem,
LangTypes::language_t  language,
XMLParserThread *  thread
) 
 

appends search_list element including the list of matches to parentNode.

Parameters:
parentNode The parent node.
replyDoc The owner document
req The search result request with the matches
maxHits Maximum number of hits to print
positionSystem Coordinate system
thread The parser thread.

bool getSearchAreaData (  DOMNode *  searchArea,
uint32 &  mapID,
uint32 &  itemID,
uint32 &  maskID,
char *&  name,
uint32 &  areaType,
MC2String &  errorCode,
MC2String &  errorMessage
) 
 

Gets the data from an search_area node.

Parameters:
searchArea The search_area node to get data from.
mapID The mapID of the area.
itemID The itemID of the area.
maskID The maskID of the area.
name Name of the area, user must delete this string!
areaType SEARCH_MUNICIPALS, SEARCH_BUILT_UP_AREAS or SEARCH_CITY_PARTS.
errorCode If problem then this is set to error code.
errorMessage If problem then this is set to error message.
Returns:
True if searchArea really is a search_area node.

bool getSearchItemData (  const DOMNode *  searchItem,
uint32 &  mapID,
uint32 &  itemID,
uint16 &  offset,
char *&  name,
uint32 &  streetNbr,
uint32 &  itemType,
MC2String &  errorCode,
MC2String &  errorMessage
) 
 

Gets the data from an search_item node.

Parameters:
searchItem The search_item node to get data from.
mapID The mapID of the item.
itemID The itemID of the item.
offset The offset of the item.
name Name of the item, user must delete this string!
itemType SEARCH_STREETS, SEARCH_COMPANIES or SEARCH_CATEGORIES.
errorCode If problem then this is set to error code.
errorMessage If problem then this is set to error message.
Returns:
True if searchItem really is a search_item node.

SearchMatch* getVanillaMatchFromItemId (  const DOMNode *  itemId  ) 
 

Creates a SearchMatch from a itemid element.

Parameters:
itemId ItemID element.

VanillaMatch* getVanillaMatchFromSearchItem (  const DOMNode *  searchItem,
MC2String &  errorCode,
MC2String &  errorMessage
) 
 

Extracts data from a search_item and puts it into a VanillaMatch.

Parameters:
searchItem The search_item node to get the data from.
errorCode If problem then this is set to error code.
errorMessage If problem then this is set to error message.
Returns:
A VanillaMatch or NULL if something was really wrong.

uint32 itemTypeToSearchItemType (  ItemTypes::itemType  type  ) 
 

Converts a ItemTypes::itemType to a Search match type.

Parameters:
type The ItemTypes::itemType to convert.
Returns:
The converted ItemTypes::itemType value.

VanillaMatch* makeVanillaMatchFromData (  uint32  mapID,
uint32  itemID,
uint16  offset,
const char *  name,
const char *  locationName,
uint32  streetNbr,
uint32  itemType
) 
 

Makes a VanillaMatch from data.

Parameters:
mapID The mapID for the VanillaMatch.
itemID The itemID for the VanillaMatch.
offset The offset for the VanillaMatch.
name The name for the VanillaMatch.
locationName The name of the location.
streetNbr The streetNbr for the VanillaMatch.
itemType The itemType for the VanillaMatch.
Returns:
A VanillaMatch or NULL if not suppored itemType.
